maqras.text: So does he not know when what (is) in the graves/burial places is scattered/over thrown/strewn
And what (is) in the chests (innermosts) is recovered/collected
That truly their Lord (is) with them (on) that day expert/experienced (E)
The resurrection/disaster/calamity
What (is) the resurrection/disaster/calamity
And what made you know/informed you what the resurrection/disaster/calamity (is)
A day/time the people be/become like the butterflies, the scattered/ravished
And the mountains be/become like the wool/dyed wool, the carded (ruffled)
So as for who his weights became heavy
So he is in (an) acceptable/approved life/quality of life
And but who his weights were reduced/lightened
So his origin (is) Hell/destruction
And what made you know/informed you what it is (E)
hot fire
The multiplication distracted/diverted you
Until you visited the cemeteries/burial places
No but you will/shall know
Then no but you will/shall know
No but if you know knowledge (of) the assurance/certainty
You would see/understand (E) the Hell
Then you will see/understand it (with) the assurance`s/certainty`s eye (visually)
Then (on) that day you will be asked/questioned (E) about the blessing/goodness
And/by the time/era/end of day to dusk
That truly the human/mankind (is) in (E) loss
Except those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, and directed/commanded with the truth/just , and directed/commanded with the patience
Calamity/scandal/woe to every/each backbiter/spurrer , defamer/blamer
Who gathered/accumulated property/possession/wealth and he counted it repeatedly
He thinks/supposes that (E) his property/possession/wealth made him immortal/eternal
No but he will be discarded/thrown away (E) in the intense fire/Hell
And what made you know/informed you what the intense fire/Hell (is)
God`s fire, the ignited/kindled
Which ascends/rises on (to) the hearts
That it truly is on them stationary/residing
In extended/spread pillars/posts
Did you not see/understand how (what) your Lord made/did with the elephant`s owners/company/ friends
Did He not make their plotting/conspiring in misguidance
And He sent on them flying/birds (in) flocks/groups gathered and following each other
It throws them with stones from dry and hardened mud
So He made them like eaten husk/chaff/leaves
To Koreish`s unification/familiarity
Their unification/familiarization (with) the winter`s and the summer`s travel/journey
So they should worship this, the House`s/Home`s Lord
Who fed them from starvation/hunger, and secured them from fear/fright
Did you see/understand who lies/denies/falsifies with the religion
So that (is) who turns down/repels the orphan
And does not urge/insight/influence on feeding the poorest of poor/poor oppressed
So calamity/scandal/woe to the prayers (praying people)
Those whom they are about their prayers negligent/inattentive
Those whom they are pretending/showing off (what they are not)
And they prevent/stop the charity
We (E), We gave/granted you the abundance (of goodness)
So pray to your Lord, and be perfect/excellent/slaughter (for charity)
That truly your hater and enemy, he is the mean and despised/of no good
Say: "You, you the disbelievers
I do not worship what you worship
And you are not worshipping what I worship
And nor I am worshipping what you worshipped
And nor you are worshipping what I worship
For you (is) your religion, and for me (is) my religion
When/if God`s victory/aid came, and the opening/judgment
And you saw the people entering in God`s religion (in) groups/crowds
So praise/glorify with your Lord`s praise/gratitude/thanks, and ask him for forgiveness, that He truly was/is forgiving
Father of the flame of a smokeless fire`s (known as Prophet Mohammad`s uncle) hand was destroyed/lost, and destroyed/lost
His property/possession/wealth and what he gained/acquired did not enrich/suffice from him
He will roast/suffer/burn (in) a fire that of (a) flame of smokeless fire
And his woman (wife) the fire wood`s/fuel`s carrier/lifter
In her neck/beautiful neck (is a) rope from palm fiber tightly woven rope/an iron ring
Say: "He is God one
God the Lord/master/intended
(He) did not give birth/procreate , and was not born/procreated
And (there) was not for Him any equal/match
Say: "I seek protection with/by Lord/master/owner (of) the daybreak/creation
From bad/evil/harm (of) what He created
And from bad/evil/harm (of an) intense dark night/moon, when/if (it) penetrated through body pores/ spread/approached
And from bad/evil/harm (of) the female magicians/sorceresses/dischargers in the knots
And from bad/evil/harm (of) an envious with jealousy , when/if he envied with jealousy
Say: "I seek protection with/by the people`s Lord/master/owner
The people`s king/owner/possessor
The people`s God
From bad/evil/harm (of) the inspirer and talker/giver of evil suggestions and temptations (whisperer of evil influences), the devil
Who inspires and talks/gives evil suggestions and temptations in the people`s chests (innermosts)
From the Jinns and the people
